txt.en: A number of violent ruffians, the very same who wounded Fuirion, have gathered in north-western Lamedon. You should clear the camp of these vicious bullies.
You have defeated a number of the vicious bandits who so brutally attacked Fuirion, stealing his satchel and leaving him for dead.
A number of violent ruffians, the very same who wounded Fuirion, have gathered in north-western Lamedon. You should clear the camp of these vicious bullies.
You have defeated a number of the vicious bandits who so brutally attacked Fuirion, stealing his satchel and leaving him for dead.
Bandits can be found in their encampment in the foothills of north-western Lamedon.\n\nYou should defeat the bandits who attacked Fuirion.
